content: Now I’m in the Hitachino Nest Brew Lab in the converted Manseibashi Station arches. It’s full of is Western Folk and blasting English pop music from ten years ago but it’s still pretty good in here. Ironically I was at the actual brewery in Ibaraki yesterday.

photo.alt: The sign board above the bar of the Manseibashi Hitachino Nest Brew Lab. the signs are hand drawn in black and backlit on a white board.
